attributes.action: Save 3 historic 18th century Weavers Cottages in Longford, Coventry from demolition by the Coventry City Council
attributes.additional_details:
The Coventry City Council are planning to demolish 3 Historic 18th Century Weavers Cottages in Longford Coventry to Extend the playground and parking facilities of Longford Primary School. The Site has plenty of room to extend in an easterly direction which would not affect these Historical Buildings.
I would like to see these buildings restored or at least sold on for someone to save part of Coventry's proud history.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
